website_summaries.verdict: Cordless and bagless design makes this model easy to use and maneuver.
pros: Lithium rechargeable battery lasts for 30 minutes
Easy to remove and clean the dirt cup, which holds 1.5 liters of dirt and debris
Comes with a 2-in-1 dusting tool designed to get into the smallest areas
cons: Works best on hardwood or tile floors
Not suggested for plush, thick carpeting

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery, but seller helped fix
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum worked for only 3 months before battery stopped charging. Called into Hoover 3 times before they diagnosed that it’s a defective battery. They require the customer (me) to pay for returning shipping charges of bad battery before they’d send a new one. Since it’s defective, I believe the company should make it right and take care of the issue, but they would not. Very disappointed in Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend and/or buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine. The suction is strong- for something so small and lightweight it picks up pet hair surprisingly well on my high-pile carpet. Great swivel and maneuverability, the light is helpful, the handle turns into its handheld attachment..its just overall a neat design. Easy to use, easy to maintain. The power and roller buttons can be a bit finicky and the hose can clog (its a tiny machine, thats to be expected) but for the price and convenience, the pros far outweigh the cons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Passes the Cheerio test !!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very light weight. Easy to use. Good suction . Cleans up literally everything from the floor ... including the tiny crumbs and cat litter. Doesn’t spit things out the back of it like a lot of vacuums do. It’s basically amazing. Because it’s so lightweight I feel it’s a bit delicate but I’ve not had anything break on it ... although I feel it may happen sooner or later. Despite this feeling it’s the best vacuum I’ve ever owned. I may add a video with Cheerios it’s that good !
customer_reviews.author: Shpaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased. I live in a large home with all wood flooring and two young boys. I use this every other day. The components are plastic and break easily but the price is worth it. It has great suction. Probably the worst component on this vacuum are the wheels. Other parts can be replaced when broken but the wheels are held in with plastic and the eventually break and there is no way to replace the piece that breaks. If you don’t have a lot of money this vacuum works well. If you have more money to spend buy the nicer ones for over $300 because this probably won’t last 2 years if used heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works a advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is with the attachment and the hose system. The attachment "click in place" button was depress to the point it didn't keep the brush attachment in place. I fixed it by bending the plastic tab into its proper position and heating it under near boiling water. The hose/handle/attachment works but is awkward to use. Otherwise the vacuum is very easy to use and picks up crumbs/dirt/etc. nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RocketJim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and does an excellent job for its size.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it. I use a higher power, and weight vacuum on the entry mat and areas where high suction is needed. The unit is easy to use, quits automatically when the battery needs charging, but came with two batteries so you can finish if one dies. Great value and keeps the wife happy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad regarding this vaccum
customer_reviews.text: The good is that it has great suction, light weigh and the battery stays charged for a good period of time. The bad is that I do not know who designed how to get to this filter but it was not for women who do not have strong hands to get to the filter. They stated it would take 24 hours to dry, it actually took over 36 hours and putting this back on the cannister proved to be impossible. I had a Hoover cordless previously and it worked great for about 5 years and was very easy to get to the filter. I have only had this vacuum for a few months and I now have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I love to vacuum now- usually every day but I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy a vacuum with a cord ever again! I love to vacuum now- usually every day but I used to hate it bc my cord was never long enough & it was annoying! This vacuum is better than any vacuum I’ve had! If it gets caught up on your rugs it will stop working properly so just take the battery out & for a few seconds, replace it & turn back on & it will work fine again. It gets caught in my kitchen rug bc it’s so thin so I found if I stand on it while I vacuum it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you can get the battery to come out. NOT!
customer_reviews.text: All good EXCEPT battery is all but impossible to remove from charger and completely impossible to remove from vacuum. Followed all directions perfectly. Amazon failed to get back to me when I contacted "expert" assistance and Hoover told me to go find a repair shop, they couldn't help me. Going back. What a bummer - cause I really liked this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum, just not great.
customer_reviews.text: Good little vacuum. It is VERY handy for quick cleaning as we have a black lab in the house. Does a good job cleaning up hair and other little bits of things that fall on the floor. Would like to give 4 stars, but the battery life leaves something to be desired. Still have to use our Dyson for a good cleaning every two weeks or so, but does a great job for us when we use it about twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mason07

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, I didn't think it would be as good as I had read. With 1 dog and 2 cats, all with long hair, I thought this machine wouldn't be up to the challenge of handling it all. I was wrong. I can do a full pass of the house and not have the battery die, though I do have to dump the canister twice, but animal hair causes that. I would recommend this vacuum to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: 13th Floor Stories

customer_reviews.title: first under warranty.  And not fixed due to Hoover I’ve bought 3 so far because I love em’
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned 3 so far- I have one under warranty but to no avail with Hoover to get it repair. So I ordered another but the broken spot is that little piece- tiny - not durable for the main use and pressure. That seems to be a flaw I’ve read amongst many customers. I would love mine repaired or replaced. I absolutely love this vacuum and the power for the batteries etc... I’ve had a couple spinal surgeries this year and it’s very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY 4 yrs. old!  Hoover no longer makes it or the batteries Ripoff !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seller should be reported. Machine is suposed to come with two batteries. Hoover says this vacuum is already 4 yrs. old!!!! No replacement battery on Amazon will work. Hoover no longer makes this vacuum of the batteries. I will report this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: vacuum review is not good
customer_reviews.text: This is the second version of this vacuum I have purchased , the first one was wonderful for years, this one does not have the suction capabilities of my original one, I hate this model. What ever you changed when you changed to this version is Not a good product it no longer even picks up the dust bunny's left by my pets , I am sorry to have purchased this model. Not even the additional battery worked and you refunded my money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Goff

customer_reviews.title: motor started making extreme loud noise a few weeks in
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this after I owned the same model for 5 years without having any issue. But this one strand making a very loud noise when turned on after just a few weeks. Not happy and won't buy this brand again once this dies.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Suction, long Battery Life, overall a 10!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we’ve bought this model and we love it. We have hard wood floors and rugs so we needed something that could do both AND go up and down three flights of stairs. It does all that and THE BATTERY last a LONG time. Only difference is our first one come with two batteries so there was always one charged. The new ones come with just one. Still a super long battery life! It also has GREAT SUCTION! (kept strong suction right up ‘til the end, when the wheels fell off).
customer_reviews.author: Shelece Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Vac
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use upright Vacuum that is easy to use without the hassle of a power cord. Works very well on hardwood floors and low to medium deep carpet. Running time per charge is about 20 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has changed my life. Because it is light and cordless, I vacuum here and there almost every day. I have carpet, hardwood, and rugs. The suction is perfect for my everyday purposes. If I get something wrapped around the brush it is easily removed with no tools needed. Super easy clean out, the canister pops off with a button and then as you hold it over the trash can another button drops the bottom hinge to dump contents.
customer_reviews.author: Charaleita

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw?  Updated
customer_reviews.text: Coming from my previous Hoover cordless vac, this one is just ok. The design of the filter however is absurd! Really bad design... I expect that the filter housing will break quickly as the removal of the dust filter to clean and reinstall is beyond cumbersome. Its one of those products that you wonder; what kind of moron tested and approved the design. Based on the filter I'd say don't buy this one! Update - after using for a while and breaking in, the filter housing loosens up and seems usable. I'm adding a star
customer_reviews.author: Captain Nemo Curat

customer_reviews.title: Where's the SECOND battery?
customer_reviews.text: This is (or at least WAS) my favorite vacuum. I've even purchased it for others. It's economical, lightweight, easy to maneuver, and best of all...NO CORDS. No cords is made possible by an interchangeable battery system...so smart...one battery charges and is ready to go when the other is used up. My three previous purchases included two batteries to operate that system. The big DISAPPOINTMENT in this purchase was that Hoover only included ONE battery this time, so when one battery runs out, you have to wait to charge the other...nothing interchangeable about that. (OR buy another battery, thus taking away the economical nature of the purchase.) I'm disappointed I can't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. My first one was (and still is) awesome. The old one is being retired to mostly shop use and the new one will be taking over the daily house vacuuming. It's VERY maneuverable and very light weight. My wife loves that the battery is close to the bottom so she isn't having the extra weight up high like many of the other cordless vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: funfan

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Hoover Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: A great little cordless vacuum cleaner (I use for wall to wall carpeting). It performs like a full sized corded vacuum. The only struggle would be changing the air filter which is difficult to remove and challenging to install. Overall, I’m very, very happy with the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: vlar

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I run a cleaning business and I am always fighting with the vacuum cord. I have used this cordless vacuum for a few weeks now and love it! The dust bin is big enough for even my clients with pets, it has great power, fairly quiet and one battery lasted thru 3 houses in one day! It might have gone through more but that is all I had that day. I recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Eschenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Hover vac
customer_reviews.text: The vac worked great for less than 6 months now the cleaning brush doesn't spin I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum. No Problems Whatsoever!...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for a couple of weeks now, and I can say it works great. Forget the Cheerios test, try the area rug test. "Gulp!" And away with messy carpets!!! Unfortunately, now you have a bigger problem: Retrieval! Fantastic battery life, powerful and light and maneuverable. The transitioning from hardwood to area rug is the only problem I've encountered at all. Love it! Five stars and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Like the suction power and dependability of Hoover. However, it DID NOT come with a spare battery as many have said it does. Charge only lasts about 30 minutes so must be fully charged before you start.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Amedee

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Very expansive product I bought before and died in short time dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous vacuum, exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: My housekeeper adores this vacuum. Cordless, lightweight, very powerful. It gets a real workout in our Airbnb.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A vacuum that doesn’t suck! Oh wait.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year with pretty minimal use. We always empty it after use. We had the corded version before this, which we owned for 3-4 years and was great until the dog chewed up the cord. When we first got this one, I thought it was relatively weak compared to the corded which was understandable. But it still functioned to a degree. But after some months of ownership, now it won’t even pick up bits of cat litter off the floor. If I were to put a straw in one nostril I could suck harder than this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the Shark it replaced. It has a battery which can be purchased separately, so you can always have one charged and when the battery dies, you need not replace the entire vacuum. Strong suction for a lightweight vacuum. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Selby

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love the cordless hoover wind tunnel technology.What I like about this cordless vacuum is that it can stand up on its own. Do not have to worry about it falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good Vac Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for myself, it came with two batteries and love it! I bought one for my Mother, her machine only came with one battery. Not good. Battery life is about 3 uses (whole house) then dies. You'll have to wait for a recharge. Hoover tells me they are out of batteries and they don't know when they will get some!!!!!!! For now I just recharge it after every use. Not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well on carpet
customer_reviews.text: This Vacuum work well on Tile and Floors but does not have enough Suction to work on Carpet. It is too light weight and just bounces over carpet for no deep cleaning..
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: I've had better
customer_reviews.text: I like the older model that have the lift off better.this one still does have a detachable hose that you can use for cleaning furniture and blinds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Many new improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to see the improvements. They will be what everyone wished hoover would change to make it the best cordless vaccum on the market. Can't tell, but I hope the be wheel problem is fixed also.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 battery
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows 2 batteries and it only came with one. The last one of these I bought a few years ago did come with 2 batteries so I was disappointed to spend $300 and only get 1!
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum cleaner itself is very good.it works perfectly well but i didn't receive any accessories such as a multi-floor brush roll,additional filter ,a soft dusting brush and so on ,i got nothing and it is totally unacceptable for me that's why i put overall rating with 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far, very pleased. This vacuum is amazing. The hose setup has some limitations and the overload reset isn’t covered in the manual (I don’t believe), but this vacuum picks up everything!
customer_reviews.author: M Sal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Very light weight and amazing suction. We have 3 dogs and it picks up their fuzziest with ease!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great little gem
customer_reviews.text: This little gem does it all. Great suction and last a long time on a single battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: victor vinson

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this vacuum. The battery charging station malfunctioned within 2.5 months. Hoover doesn't have this as an available "replacement part". They offered to send me a stick vacuum that is about half the price of what I originally paid for this vacuum. Since my purchase is outside of the Amazon return window it's my loss. Very disappointed in Hoover and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum but not easy to change the battery
customer_reviews.text: This is out second Hoover cordless vacuum. Our prior one was easier to remove the battery to charge. I have to have my husband remove the battery to charge on this new vacuum. This is important to me because he isn't always around. I was going to get an additional battery, but because of this I have decided not to.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Ufkin

customer_reviews.title: Now my back doesn't hurt when I vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Love it being cordless so I can do touch up vacuuming quickly. Very light and works well under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of cordless and that is has the ...
customer_reviews.text: This my second one. I love the idea of cordless and that is has the function as a regular vacuum My 1 st one the wheels didn’t hold up and twice the price of the vacuum to replace and my 2ed one had a short in it
customer_reviews.author: lisa keener

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but performance isn't enough.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the cordless feature (and this is the main reason for purchasing this model) it has significantly less suction power compared to the corded model I bought this as a replacement for. Unfortunately, for my needs I'm going to have to buy something more powerful (a Dyson v10 or v11).
customer_reviews.author: KaRu

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. If she’s happy I’m happy and she has never vacuumed so much.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived promptly, and has reduced the time it takes to clean my house. Battery lasts a long longer than i expected. Last long enough to clean a 4000 sq ft home.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner works great but its hard to find a back-up battery for it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for months now, it works great, powerful suction.
customer_reviews.author: stephen b white

customer_reviews.title: This model is not good.
customer_reviews.text: suction stinks. All dirt sits at top of can so have to shove my hand in there to get out debris. Suction for hose is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small sweeper for our lake condo. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: kathryn pate

customer_reviews.title: It's a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The cordless vacuum is easy to use and quite convenient. It is a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hoover cordless Vacumn. It’s my second one.Gave my daughter my first one then ordered me another.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Power lasts and so much easier that messing with a cord.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vac. I have them for my business and home.
customer_reviews.author: DLindberg49

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Pretty strong power dor this price. Easy to maneuver. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning business and this is exactly what I use. The battery lasts at least two decent size houses. I’m extremely pleased. By far the best vacuum I’ve used to work with. The cordless aspect is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: katie peachee

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. The battery life is something that it lacks.
customer_reviews.author: reneejenny84

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it does what is It is supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Jerome  Mason

customer_reviews.title: Hoover wind tunnel vac
customer_reviews.text: They no longer make this vacuum. So yiu cannot buy am extra battery or filters.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to twist canister back together after cleaning filter.
customer_reviews.text: When I do not have to clean the filter- this machine is great! However! I live alone and I have to call family members to come and assist me getting the canister put back together. It makes me want to donate it and purchase another machine.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Genung

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: This is the vacuum I have been looking for. Great suction, easy to maneuver, cordless. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. Love-no cord. Love-light weight. Love-does a GREAT job. Worth the price would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hoover..powerful, cordless. I'm using both. We use the older Hoover for the garage, patio, etc. The new Hoover we use inside home. The best vacuum ever.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good results.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend and he actually uses it! So easy! He said it only came with one battery. Mine had two.
customer_reviews.author: Cynscott

customer_reviews.title: battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery removal from the vacuum is impossible for me to do.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it my wife did she loved it
customer_reviews.author: mike Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum. But
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum. But!should have been sent to Australia with 240v charger. Cost extra 120 dollars 4 transform to go from 120 to 240v.
customer_reviews.author: Robert stammers

customer_reviews.title: A great vaccume
customer_reviews.text: This little giant works great. It is light weight and picks up everything. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ted Busch

customer_reviews.title: Reviewed
customer_reviews.text: It moves very well around objects. The suction power is less than desirable, I have to go area multiple times to get the desirable cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: amberc

customer_reviews.title: We love this. It works great on our stairs and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It works great on our stairs and the area rug we have in our living room. It is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum!! This is our 2nd one purchased. We had the first one for several years, before it went out. Love that it comes with 2 batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5-6 months. Wasn’t working properly before then either and suctioning less and less.
customer_reviews.author: Kareen Matouk

customer_reviews.title: suction
customer_reviews.text: The reason is maybe the filter gets clogged.. sometimes does not make it all the way up mm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much this was my 2nd purchase one for upstairs and one for downstairs
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McCleese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vac
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge for weeks! If you are upgrading from a dead 14V you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paige Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for quick pick ups!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for quick pick ups. The battery lasts a long time and the suction is great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the second battery for this products
customer_reviews.author: Taylovelee

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these BH50111 in the past. They all had two batteries in the box. This one only had one battery for the same price as before. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I owned the version before this one. A plug in. This new one has significantly less suction power
customer_reviews.author: christopher keller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and I didn't pay the Dyson price
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I hoped for and more. Excellent and I didn't pay the Dyson price. So there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum came with only one battery instead of two as ...
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum came with only one battery instead of two as advertised as others whom have reviewed this product state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So i got the vacuum that I boufht used. ...
customer_reviews.text: So i got the vacuum that I boufht used.. hair on the roller. No big deal. The vacuum has a battery. BUT the charger was not sent. Not sure if person forgot to ship it. No I have an electric vacuum that will work for 20 mins then once battery does I will need to go buy a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Kawas

customer_reviews.title: The only vacuum most people need
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful and light, this largely eliminates the need to have a separate larger corded vacuum for deep cleaning versus the battery-powered for everyday. Also, we had a previous model very similar to this which had a problem with stalling when it pulled in the edge of the carpets in our house. This one does not seem to have that same defect.
customer_reviews.author: culture vulture

customer_reviews.title: THEY BREAK REAL EASY AND HOOVER IS NO HELP WITH SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for a cordless vacuum to simply vacuum our tile floors. It does work good but the wheels and the cheap plastic that holds the wheels broke. After failed attempts for HOOVER TO CONTACT US from their very weak support system. I looked into the assembly and its all ONE BIG PIECE OF CRAPPY PLASTIC which all of it needs to be replaced. TOTAL TRASH of a product assembly and VERY BAD SUPPORT FROM HOOVER. I ended up buying another and keeping the parts not broken in case something else happens cause SUPPORT FROM HOOVER is BAD.
customer_reviews.author: XtremeIT

customer_reviews.title: BEST STICK VAC EVER
customer_reviews.text: Had the Shark Freestyle and it worked fine except it didn’t have any attachments, so I’d have to get out the big vac to get in corners etc. This vac is wonderful: not too heavy, has wand and crevice tool; suction power is great (considering its cordless); and the light is nice and bright. Battery lasts longer than I need it to as well. Highly recommend, especially for the price. UPDATE: THIS IS THE BEST VACUUM EVER. I AM CONSTANTLY SHOCKED BY HOW MUCH IT SUCKS UP!
customer_reviews.author: Mountainman

customer_reviews.title: according to the ad this should have came with two ...
customer_reviews.text: according to the ad this should have came with two batteries and there was only one. I had ordered one before and received a battery on the machine and a battery in the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cordless Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hoover cordless vacuum. The first lasted for several years. It still runs but I decided to go ahead and get a new one. Don't over expect and keep it clean and you will be happy for years. I have seen pictures that looks like someone vacuumed up an animal with bad reviews but that's not what this vacuum is made for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great all around cordless solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought an used one from Amazon Warehouse, like new. The only issue that I had was that the battery sometimes doesn't fit correctly, so you have to make sure the placement is perfect. Had another battery from another hoover cordless vaccum and it worked without any issues. It's heavy, but the value of not having to deal with the power cable makes it a perfect solution. The battery will last enough to cover a small two bedroom apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A.

customer_reviews.title: I've bought two and might buy another in a few years.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these. The first lasted for a while before plastic parts cracking beyond economic repair. I bought a second because the positives of the first outwieghed its demise. Although I would have liked it to have lasted longer. This vacuum uses a lot of plastic to keep down the weight perhaps more than it should.
customer_reviews.author: Big IV

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to maneuver but the suction power doesn't compare to the corded version. It seems more cheaply made than the corded version and the sticker on the front left residue when peeled off. I didn't have any goo gone and had to use rubbing alcohol to take it off. It was a huge pain. Other than that it's still nice especially the front light. Since I have hard wood floors and only an area rug the suction power doesn't really matter for me
customer_reviews.author: Lexus C.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Well... what can I say? Works GREAT when it works. I did want to love this vacuum. But it doesn't last. We bought two. One lasted 9 months. The second one one month. We used them once per week. Super cheap and low quality. Breaks easily. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: CHeretic

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but I think they’re not made as well as they started
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first one 2-3 years ago, worked amazing and only $99. Then bought a second one that worked for 2 uses and cost $129. So I just went back to using the older first one and used the second one for replacement parts on the first. After 3 years my first one finally died and I loved it, but not going to keep paying more for another that doesn’t work as well as my original that cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Vbcoastalsoul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light weight cordless vac
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the Hoover air. My 2nd one. However the filter was really tuff to get in after opening to take out packing tab. Husband and I finally was able to twist back into place with both of us. I threw out all boxes so didnt want to repack and return. Works great as previous one. Dreading changing filter when time comes. Hope its easier to twist canister together.
customer_reviews.author: b gehl

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase of this Model
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this cordless model. The rechargeable battery lasts 45 minutes which is great. Also, it stands by itself and doesn't have to hang on the wall like the newer models. I had a second battery before and now I have three! It's perfect for my tile floors and the latest model seems to be a bit quieter.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cheep and hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst machines I had seen in years! I opened the box and returning it immediately! Lots of plastic that are hard to open and close. Looks like a cheap plastic toy. I opened the filter to remove the tag and never could close it again! To remoce the battery I broke my nail!!! Don’t waist time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lemgruber Casahuga

customer_reviews.title: Light weight vacuum which frees you from the cord
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light weight but seems sturdy enough. Battery lasts long enough to vacuum our great room and a bedroom or two as long as you don't dawdle. It's easy to empty and overall considering the price a good purchase to use on a smaller residence.
customer_reviews.author: Bucyrusboy

customer_reviews.title: Bought used, arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item from “Good buy products” in Used - Very good condition. Vacuum arrived in unusable condition due to a broken plastic clip that holds the handle in place. The vacuum itself is an excellent product, this would’ve been our second one because we like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Our second one
customer_reviews.text: After using the first one for three years that had to pick up from a long hair cat I looked for a better cord free vacuum. I couldn't find another that I liked as well and this one still has the best suction even if a have to clean the brushes sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: jd9500

customer_reviews.title: Convenient except for the cleaning hose
customer_reviews.text: The wireless feature is an amazing convenience. Not too loud, easy on/off and carpet-brush/floor setting. 2 disadvantages: This is not especially lightweight, and the cleaning hose is very hard to use because it comes up from the bottom and is very short, and doesn't even have a good extension piece.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. This is my 3rd one. I keep one in the bedroom and on in the living room. When the living room vacuum died I searched to find this one again. Best cordless on the market
customer_reviews.author: heartis4u

product_meta.title: Hoover Air Cordless 20 Volt Lithium Ion Bagless Steerable Upright Vacuum Cleaner, BH50111
product_meta.description: The air cordless vacuum contains all the technology you'd expect to find in a Hoover upright. It includes a steerable design and a weight of just 9.9 pounds and removable cleaning tools. All backed by a 5-year limited warranty. We removed the cord but kept everything else. It's a simple change that changes everything.
feature_bullets: Lithium life battery technology provides an average of 25 minutes of fade Free battery Power on carpet and hard floors
Wind Tunnel 3 Technology uses three channels of suction to lift and remove deep down, embedded dirt
High Capacity, Easy empty and Easy clean dirt cup
Includes a 2 in 1 dusting and crevice tool that cleans crevices, vents and furniture surfaces with ease

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars347 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
